pageContext.claim: “No, I have a good relationship with Kim Jong Un. That's not a bad thing to have a good relationship. Obama wanted a relationship; he wouldn't meet with Obama. Wouldn't meet with him. Okay? I have a good relationship with him.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a Four Pinocchio claim. No public records or news articles show that Obama ever tried to meet with Kim. Former U.S. intelligence officials and experts on North Korea said they knew of no evidence for Trump’s claim. Many of Obama’s top advisers on North Korea said Trump’s claim was false. In fact, Obama’s strategy after 2012 was to escalate sanctions and not meet with North Koreans.
